item.title: Overgrown grass on football pitch, 3rd July
item.description:
Old richians sports ground, football games start 12th July and grass is long especially where railway staff moved goals and left them on pitch without moving them back
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sandyleaze, Longlevens, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping, 2nd July

This has been growing since middle June now is a fire risk it's a pathway between 2 council flats

item.title: Tree branches too low, 2nd July

item.title: Bridleway from Far Stanley up Stanley Hill blocked by fallen tree., 2nd July
item.description:
The tree is over the bridleway. It is passable (although not for horses or cyclists). In my estimation the maximum diameter of the trunks is 15cm. Possibly a job for CVW.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Prescott, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Speed bump not marked, 2nd July
item.description:
The speed bumps at this location next to St Faith’s care home are not marked and very hard to see on approach (as well as being degraded, with potholes forming). The ones further towards Gloucester Road are marked properly so these should be as well
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Malvern Road, Alstone, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road markings, lines and stud issues

item.title: Tree with solid overhanging limbs which have cracked the windscreen on the top deck of a bus operating service 97 to Cheltenham at 12:06 on 02/07/2025, 2nd July
item.description:
The tree is located in Station Road, Churchdown about 50 metres south east of the bus stop shelter named Community Centre (bus stop id is glodjtmt). what3words location is spaces.cheetahs.merge. It is the first in a line of trees on the nearside of the road leading up to the railway bridge.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Station Road, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
